targets.query: from(bucket: "air_quality") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air_quality") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "co2")
from(bucket: "air_quality") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air_quality") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pm25")
from(bucket: "air_quality") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air_quality") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp")
from(bucket: "air_quality") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air_quality") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voc")
from(bucket: "air_quality") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air_quality") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "nox")
from(bucket: "air_quality") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "air_quality") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "humidity")
